definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The cell fusion of fish is an important technology in cell engineering.
sentences.chinese: 人工诱导鱼类细胞融合是细胞工程中的一项重要技术。

sentences.english: Objective To provide antigenic cells suitable for cell fusion to preparing lung cancer vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的为研制肺癌疫苗提供适合细胞融合的抗原细胞。

sentences.english: Confluenced immune spleen cells were inoculated in 12 plates with 96 wells each.
sentences.chinese: 免疫脾细胞与骨髓瘤细胞融合后接种12块96孔板。

sentences.english: The fusion of cells to form a hybrid cell is a basic procedure in cell engineering.
sentences.chinese: 细胞融合与形成杂交细胞是细胞工程的一项基本操作。

sentences.english: All these experimental set-up deviced and developed by us was called cell fusion apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 我们把按此设计研制的整套装置称为细胞融合仪。

sentences.english: The last booster was given 4-7 days prior to cells fusion.
sentences.chinese: 最后一次注射是在细胞融合之前4～7天。
